name: StockoBan
description:
StockoBan is my first game made with Godot engine.

I wanted something simple yet fun so I decided to make a clone of the famouse Sokoban game.
The game has 9 levels.

Controls:

KeyActionW
move up
Amove left
Smove downDmove rightRreload levelESCback to main menu

Credits:

Sound effects are from Freesound.org (https://freesound.org/)

Textures are made by me with Gimp. (https://www.gimp.org/)

The game, scripts are made by me, in Godot Engine v3.0.6. (https://godotengine.org/)
